steps.title: Addon-Store
steps.text: Left panel > Settings > Add-on Store or click here arrow_right

steps.title: Install
steps.text: Scroll to the Binding you need and click the INSTALL button

steps.title: Thing Inbox
steps.text: Left panel > Settings > Things > Inbox or click here arrow_right

steps.title: New Thing
steps.text: Click on the plus_circle_fill in the lower-right corner

steps.title: Choose Binding
steps.text: Click on the listing of the Binding for the Thing you want to add to openHAB

steps.title: Scan
steps.text: Click the Scan button to automatically search for related devices

steps.title: Add Thing
steps.text: Select the device from the list of Discovered Things and Click OK to add the Thing

steps.title: Thing List
steps.text: Left panel > Settings > Things or click here arrow_right

steps.title: Select Thing
steps.text: Click on the listing for the Thing you want to configure

steps.title: Configuration
steps.text: Follow the documentation for the Thing's Binding to add configuration then click Save in upper right-hand corner

steps.title: Thing List
steps.text: Left panel > Settings > Things or click here arrow_right

steps.title: Select Thing
steps.text: Click on the listing for the Thing you want to interface with

steps.title: Channels
steps.text: Click on the Channels tab in the center at the top of the Thing Page

steps.title: Select Channel
steps.text: Click to expand the Channel you will control and then click plus_circle_fill Add Link to Item

steps.title: New Item
steps.text: Select the Create a new Item option

steps.title: Add Item
steps.text: Click the blue Link button at the bottom of the page

steps.title: Select Page from Page List
steps.text: Left panel > Settings > Pages > Overview or click here arrow_right

steps.title: Add Block, Row, and Column
steps.text: Click on the Add Block, Add Row, and Add Column buttons in the editor

steps.title: Add Widget
steps.text: Click the gray rectangle and select a card appropriate for the intended item (for example, a toggle card for a switch item)

steps.title: Configure Widget
steps.text: Click the black menu button above the right corner of the widget and select Configure Widget

steps.title: Select Item
steps.text: Click on the Item field and select an appropriate item from the list then click Done

steps.title: Save Page
steps.text: Click Save in the upper right corner of the editor

steps.title: View Home Page
steps.text: Click here to return to the Home Overview Page arrow_right
